Title: Battlelog Mobile
Description:
Battlelog Mobile retrieves your real time Battlefield 3 soldier information from EA / DICE Battlelog server to your Windows Phone. You are able to track your progression in easy, intuitive manner with lots of "eye candy", such as images and charts.

All three platforms are supported (PC, PS3, XBox). 

This is a WP7 application, developed in C# and it will be active as long as EA / DICE lacks to provide their own "killer" for mobile devices.
